text: Paul Brough (born 24 January 1965) is an English former professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Knaresborough Town, York Railway Institute and Nestlé Rowntree. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Knaresborough Town A.F.C. players Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Nestlé Rowntree F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Paul Brough (footballer)
